Tests Input.dispatchMouseEvent method.

type: mousedown
button: 0
buttons: 1

y: 200

button: 1
buttons: 5

y: 200
-----Event-----

button: 1
buttons: 1

y: 200

button: 0
buttons: 0

y: 200

button: 0
buttons: 0

y: 150
